configuration.interfaces:
[% FOREACH interface IN interfaces %]
[% interface.name %]
[% interface.tag %] OESS-L2CCC-[% circuit_id %] vlan-ccc [% interface.tag %]
[% END %]

protocols.mpls:
OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %] L2CCC-LSP-ATTRIBUTES [% dest %] [% FOREACH path IN paths %] [% IF path.name == 'PRIMARY' %]
OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]-[% path.name %] manual
[% ELSE %]
OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]-[% path.name %]
[% END %] [% END %]
[% FOREACH path IN paths %]
OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]-[% path.name %] [% IF path.mpls_path_type == 'strict' %] [% FOREACH ip IN path.path %]
[% ip %]
[% END %] [% ELSE %]
[% dest %]
[% END %]
[% END %]

connections.remote-interface-switch: OESS-L2CCC-[% circuit_id %] [% FOREACH interface IN interfaces %] [% interface.name %].[% interface.tag %] [% END %] OESS-L2CCC-[% a_side %]-[% path.dest_node %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %] OESS-L2CCC-[% path.dest_node %]-[% a_side %]-LSP-[% circuit_id %]
